title: Issue prioritization v2: Backend support for saved scoring profiles (CRUD + apply)

sections.text: Implement backend APIs and persistence for saved scoring profiles that define per-dimension weights (Support SLA risk, Product impact, Sales deal blockers) and aggregation settings. Add endpoints to create/update/delete/list profiles at the org (and optionally user-default) scope and to apply a selected profile when computing an issue’s aggregated score. Ensure backward compatibility by providing a default profile that mirrors the existing single-score behavior when no profile is selected.
